meanings.sent1: The puppy was wiggier than the older dog.
meanings.sent2: The new toy was wiggier than the old one.
meanings.sent3: The wiggier dance moves of the clown made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her wiggier imagination took her on wild adventures.
meanings.sent5: The wiggier colors of the sunset painted the sky in a beautiful way.

meanings.definition: More wiggly or erratic in behavior or movement.
meanings.sent1: The squirrel was wiggier than usual today.
meanings.sent2: The wiggier path through the forest was more challenging to walk on.
meanings.sent3: The wiggier behavior of the children at the party kept the adults on their toes.
meanings.sent4: Her wiggier thoughts led her to unexpected places.
meanings.sent5: The wiggier river flowed swiftly through the valley.
